mapper.select: SELECT P1.PD_CD , P1.PD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ S1 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 AC251 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ S2 /* 정기BS투입품목내역 AC252 */ ON S1.ASN_OJ_YM = S2.ASN_OJ_YM AND S1.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S2.CNTR_SN AND S1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD = S2.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AND S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = S2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND S1.WK_SN = S2.WK_SN AND S1.PDCT_PD_CD = S2.PDCT_PD_CD AND S1.IST_NMN_N = S2.IST_NMN_N INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON P1.PD_CD = S2.PU_PART_PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}
SELECT CST_SIGN_CN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}
